name: intergeneric
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
involving more than one genus (= a group of plants or animals that are all related to each other): The leyland cyprus is an inter-generic hybrid. an intergeneric comparison of seed size
More examplesFewer examplesAn intergeneric orchid hybrid is placed in a wall opening in the garden room.The intergeneric cross of the Asian catfish and the African catfish produced viable hybrids.In some intergeneric crosses, fertilization apparently occurs but the hybrid embryos are aborted.
